name: The Amazing Game Idea Generator
description:
Have you ever run out of ideas for a new game? "The Amazing Game Idea Generator" is the solution!

This tool was created to help people exercise creativity and practice their Game Design skills.

Open the "Game Idea Packs" to reveal 3 cards with themes. Use these themes to create a crazy pitch for the game! (or maybe create the whole game concept?)

Have fun creating your games! We would love to hear about your amazing creations!

(IMPORTANT! IF THE GAME IS GIVING YOU A BLACK SCREEN, RUN IT ON COMPATIBILITY MODE!) or try the second link
